name: lexagons.
description:
lexagons is a game you can play three times a day. 

Each time you play is a puzzle where you have to build 10 words. Everyone in the world gets the same puzzles each day!

You will be presented with the start of a word, and 6 choices to make it longer. 

  • Some are good and extend the word in a way that leave it still possible to become a valid word (if it isn't one yet.) 
  • Some are bad, and you want to avoid these. Every time you ruin your word, you lose a heart. Lose all 3 and you're done.

Press an option, and press the tick, to confirm your selection.

For each word, there is a minimum length the word needs to be before it is acceptable. The xs after the current letters show how many letters are still needed.

As soon as what you've made is both a word and long enough, congratulations, you get a point! Now you get the start of another word to build!

Get 10 points, and you win!

Try chilled, regular, and difficult modes each day, and see how high a rating you can get! Words are rated based on their relative rarity.
